name: Toaster Jam
description:
Toaster Swipe is a fast paced breakfast themed arcade game with quirky puzzle elements which will test your reflexes and requires quick thinking. Guide a little carb-hungry toaster around spiky doughnuts and past angry forks to toast as many slices of bread as you can! Power up your toaster with coffee and jam boosts to complete levels faster and get higher scores.

★ 30+ levels to test your skills
★ 3 endless obstacle courses
★ Built-in level editor
★ Multiple toaster skins to unlock
★ Dozen of stats to beat
★ Achievements and leaderboards
